field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the user account.

field.label: Username
field.help: Set the unique username for the user. Allowed characters are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, and ,._-!$%/()+#= with up to 128 signs

field.label: Password
field.help: Set the password for the user.

field.label: Description
field.help: Surname, Lastname, or anything you need to describe.

field.label: IP Address
field.help: Set the IP address the user should receive.

field.label: VLAN ID
field.help: VLAN ID the user get's in, e.g. for 802.1X, leave empty if you don't know what it is.
